page.title: 08Employment in Bromp on Swale
page.content: The biggest employer is{ARC Pipeline {Construction}(see page 19). Other employers are:{Marley Extrusions}who make bathrooms and pipes employ 102 men and 12 ladies, {John Lyon}who hauls fertilizer, coke and coal by heavy goods vehicles employs 12 men and 1 lady, {Meynells}who make cattle feeds employs 10 people , {Roper Caravans who sell touring caravans employs 5 people, {Catterick Caravans and {Camping Centre}has 12 employees, {Teeside Caravan Services has 3 workers, {Teeside Farmers Oils employ 5 people, {Bradstone}who make concrete products employ 37 men.
